text: Moominiiney dago Ayrooray ixxu-le (Qarfâ Qiidik lakal tan Sidiica Ayro kinnuk) Yalla cusa, tokkel yisissikeeh mina deqsita Aracak Namma Ayroh Addat (taban kee Nammey haytoh Ayro kinnuk) Ayro kortak Naharat jamaraat deqsita Aracat xeet Qideek lakal yewqe numul toysa dambi mayan, Qerfah Alsak taban kee Sidoc haytoh Ayro jamaraat deqsita Aracat xeet hayya haam fanah minal elle wadirroowe numul toysa dambi mayan, cajjil Yalli kaa kak waaseh yaniimik Yallak meesiteh yan numul, moominiiney isin Abba haytaanamal inkih Yallak meesitaay Diggah isin cisab kee galtoh kay foocal maagowtoonu waytaanam ixiga Qhiyaamah Ayró
